Key Match Events: Jaime Jaquez Jr. posted an efficient near triple-double statline in the game against the Utah Jazz
Post-Match Reflections: Jaime Jaquez Jr. spoke on the performance from him and his team postgame, stating: "I really needed to make those free throws (down the stretch), make up for the last game. I'm really happy I got to seal it like that. Really proud of how the guys came out and played. We've been battling and working so hard. This was a win we deserved."
Miscellaneous Highlights: Jaime Jaquez Jr. is averaging 18.0 points, 8.0 rebounds, 6.0 assists and 2.3 steals on 56.3% shooting over the last three games for the Miami Heat
Jaime Jaquez Jr. went 3 of 5 from 3-point range in Utah, and even stepped up for some clutch ones in the final minutes of the fourth quarter
Others: The Heat have gone 2-1 in this stretch, including back-to-back wins after Thursday's win over the Utah Jazz
Jaime Jaquez Jr. has been solid on the defensive end, getting active in all the passing lanes and holding his own on individual matchups
